wordpressPage.title: East Midlands
wordpressPage.content:
Frontier Centre – Northampton – Website

The Frontier Centre is a residential centre run by Rock UK who run several residential centres throughout the UK. The Frontier Centre offers a range of residential options for youth groups with plenty of activities on offer. For full information check their website

Hollowford Centre – Castleton, Derbyshire – Website

The The Hollowford Centre is a large centre sleeping up to 130 guests between 4 buildings. They offer a variety of residential options and can include plenty of activities. See their website for booking details and costs

Castleton Rotary Centre – Castleton, Derbyshire – Website

In the heart of the peak district Castleton Rotary Centre can accomodate up to 50 people and offers some facilities including a sports hall and some large grounds. For full information and booking costs please see their website.

The Peak Centre – Hope Valley, Derbyshire – Website

The Peak Centre is situated 25 miles from Sheffield and has various sleeping options with 2 main buildings which can sleep 26 or 22 (or you can book both). There are also activities and catering options you can buy into. For full information and booking costs please see their website.
